Show me the top 10 customers by sales value.
Create a comprehensive sales dashboard showing monthly trends, top products, and division performance.

[
  {
    "type": "chart",
    "title": "Monthly Sales Trends",
    "code": "SELECT DATEPART(YEAR, [JOB_DATE]) AS SalesYear, DATEPART(MONTH, [JOB_DATE]) AS SalesMonth, SUM(CAST([SALES_VALUE] AS FLOAT)) AS MonthlySales FROM kpc_data WHERE [TRAN_TYPE] = 'Sales' GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, [JOB_DATE]), DATEPART(MONTH, [JOB_DATE]) ORDER BY SalesYear, SalesMonth",
    "x": "SalesMonth",
    "y": "MonthlySales",
    "kind": "line"
  },
  {
    "type": "chart",
    "title": "Top 10 Products by Sales Value",
    "code": "SELECT TOP 10 [ITEM_NAME_E], SUM(CAST([SALES_VALUE] AS FLOAT)) AS TotalSalesValue FROM kpc_data WHERE [TRAN_TYPE] = 'Sales' GROUP BY [ITEM_NAME_E] ORDER BY TotalSalesValue DESC",
    "x": "ITEM_NAME_E",
    "y": "TotalSalesValue",
    "kind": "bar"
  },
  {
    "type": "chart",
    "title": "Division Performance by Sales Value",
    "code": "SELECT [DIVISION_NAME], SUM(CAST([SALES_VALUE] AS FLOAT)) AS TotalSalesValue FROM kpc_data WHERE [TRAN_TYPE] = 'Sales' GROUP BY [DIVISION_NAME] ORDER BY TotalSalesValue DESC",
    "x": "DIVISION_NAME",
    "y": "TotalSalesValue",
    "kind": "bar"
  }
]
